Posts.Content: Hi, I'm 17 and found a hard lump in my left breast, it's sort of half on the areola, half off. I'm going to the doctors this afternoon and I think you should too. It could be nothing but it's best to get it checked out. Let me know how you get on.
Posts.Title: hard lump on areola?

Posts.Content: I'm 17 and found a hard, grape-like lump in my left breast two days ago. I cannot be sure but I think it's increased in size over the two days. I think it's moveable but not 100% sure. I'm going to the doctor's to get it checked out this afternoon but I'm really worried about it.
Posts.Title: 17 years old - found hard lump in left breast
